metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8820 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Tor before 0.2.5.16, 0.2.6 through 0.2.8 before 0.2.8.17, 0.2.9 before0.2.9.14, 0.3.0 before 0.3.0.13, and 0.3.1 before 0.3.1.9, remote attackerscan cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and applicationcrash) against directory authorities via a malformed descriptor, akaTROVE-2017-010.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8820` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.2
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.2').
